Force match_input_image for skin-realism preset

Added presetId parameter throughout the image editor pipeline to enable special handling for the ''skin-realism'' preset. When this preset is used, the aspect_ratio is forcibly set to "match_input_image" to preserve the original image dimensions and ensure perfect alignment in before/after preview.

Changes:
- Added presetId to frontend requestBody
- Modified API routes to pass presetId through the chain
- Updated NanoBananaEditRequest interface to include presetId
- Enhanced aspect_ratio logic in nano-banana.ts to force match_input_image for skin-realism
- Updated all imageEditor method signatures to accept presetId parameter

This fixes the alignment issues in the skin preset slider where images were being stretched or cropped due to aspect ratio mismatch.
